entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as a person who is innocent until proven guilty. He is described as someone who listens to Dumbledore even if he doesn't like what he hears.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who has been telling the truth about Sirius. Harry and Ron believe that Dumbledore would go mad if Sirius turned out to be a Death Eater.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who believes that Sirius wouldn't turn up because he listens to Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who is worried about Sirius and has a lot on his plate.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who is trying to help Harry by telling him not to worry about Sirius.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as a group of people that Sirius is accused of being part of.
